snippet.title: Crime or Punishment - Six One Indie Showcase Trailer
snippet.description: Meet the main character of Crime or Punishment in this narrative trailer for the upcoming puzzle adventure game. Crime or Punishment will be available on PC, and a demo is out now on Steam. Play as a corrupt detective on the mob’s payroll, and cover up their crimes. Read files, collect information and obscure evidence to frame an innocent bystander, who was at the wrong place, at the wrong time. After all, crime pays.
